sentence.Network_en: Forsteritic olivine almost invariably represents primary precipitate material.
sentence.Network_cn: 镁质橄榄石几乎总是代表了原生沉淀物.

sentence.Network_en: The olivine grains in the troctolite of the Upper Zone are rather short and thick.

sentence.Network_en: Olivine has been completely altered to serpentine, talc, and amphibole in the bore - hole examined in detail.
sentence.Network_cn: 钻芯详细检查的结果,橄榄石全部蚀变为蛇纹石 、 滑石及角闪石.
